articles.title: ‘Death Stranding 2’ is Hideo Kojima at the peak of his powers - The Washington Post
articles.description: “Death Stranding 2: On the Beach” is Hideo Kojima’s most complete story in years, set across an ambitious, awe-inspiring open world.

articles.title: Nothing Headphone 1 leaks show quirky translucent design - The Verge
articles.description: Leaks of the Nothing Headphone 1 show a squircle earcup with the company’s signature transparent elements and support for what looks like a 3.5mm audio cable.
